LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_CandleBulkSmall.label: Make Mousekin Candle x5
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_CandleBulkSmall.descriptio: Melt beeswax and cast a small batch of candles.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_CandleBulkLarge.label: Make Mousekin Candle x25
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_CandleBulkLarge.descriptio: Melt beeswax and cast a large batch of candles.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_ClockworkComponent.label: make Clockwork Mechanism
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_ClockworkComponent.descrip: Make a Clockwork Mechanism by forming and trimming steel into intricate metal components.
LanguageData.Mousekin_Make_ClockworkComponentBulk.des: Make a batch of Clockwork Mechanisms by forming and trimming steel into intricate metal components.
